    • \
    • global
    • \PHPUnitTask

    Runs PHPUnit tests.

    Use Project#createTask to register a new Task.

    author Michiel Rook
    version $Id: 4554fdd642b6ef7774cbb89c537ccba90f3ca972 $
    package phing.tasks.ext.phpunit
    see \global\BatchTest
    since 2.1.0
    copyright 2001,2002 THYRELL. All rights reserved

    getTaskType() : string
    Inherited
    inherited_from \Task::getTaskType()

    Returns

    stringThe type of this task (XML Tag)

    Initialize Task.

    init() 

    This method includes any necessary PHPUnit libraries and triggers appropriate error if they cannot be found. This is not done in header because we may want this class to be loaded w/o triggering an error.

    Exceptions

    \BuildException

    Provides a project level log event to the task.

    log(string $msg, integer $level) 
    Inherited
    see \global\BuildEvent
    see \global\BuildListener
    inherited_from \Task::log()

    Parameters

    $msg

    string

    The message to log

    $level

    integer

    The priority of the message

    The main entry point

    main() 

    This method may be called more than once, if the task is invoked more than once. For example, if target1 and target2 both depend on target3, then running phing target1 target2 will run all tasks in target3 twice.

    Should throw a BuildException if someting goes wrong with the build

    This is abstract here. Must be overloaded by real tasks.

    Exceptions

    \BuildException
